privacyAndPolicyDescription: Please, read Keshi's privacy and policy and accept it to continue creating your account
acceptPrivacyPolicy: I read and accept Keshi's privacy and policy
privacyPolicyContent:
By default, the application connects to a number of relays in the Nostr network to send and receive messages. The relays may not be operated by Keshi developers. You can change the default relays at will..

On Nostr, private messages are encrypted, but anyone can see who you're chatting with and when..

The application wraps the web application at https: //keshi.one. The hosting provider logs user IP addresses and page-view counts, which are used to follow unique user count and usage by country..

Keshi users can register an optional username for convenience that redirects to their Nostr public profile https://keshi.one/username. In this process, user IP address and country code are saved..

Otherwise, Keshi developers do not collect any information about you or your usage of the application..

We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time and without prior notice. Your continued use of the app after the posting of any modified Privacy Policy indicates your acceptance of the terms of the modified Privacy Policy.

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@keshi.one
globalSubtitle: Posts related to all the topics of Keshi
chatSubtitle: This will guide you with all what you need about Cybersecurity.
lnd_description: Get A Non-Custodial Lightning Address With Keshi To receive Lightning Payments From Anyone, Anywhere In The World.
KeshiGPTSubtitle: Tons of questions, Tons of answers. Keshi GPT is a chatbot that can answer your questions about Cybersecurity.
noLndSupport:
Keshi Money Address powered by AbuCash - a Universal eCash Address for Bitcoin payments that's always available - even when your phone's offline!
Currently, Support for Keshi eCash is not available in your area, but we're working on it.
keshiAppAboutContent:
Keshi is an anonymous tips and alerts for Cybersecurity professionals powered by Nostr - The new decentralized communication protocol that doesn't rely on blockchain technology to scale.
Keshi app is a comprehensive mobile application designed to assist and enrich the experience of cybersecurity professionals.
defaultQuestions:
What are the different types of cyber threats that individuals and organizations face?
How can I create strong and unique passwords for all my online accounts?
What are the best practices for securing my home Wi-Fi network?
How can I identify and avoid phishing scams?
What steps should I take to protect myself from malware and ransomware attacks?
What is the importance of keeping software applications up to date?
How can I enable two-factor authentication (2FA) for my online accounts?
What are the potential risks associated with using public Wi-Fi networks?
What data should I be cautious about sharing online?
How can I recognize and report suspicious online activity?
What are the legal implications of cybercrime?
What resources are available to help me learn more about cybersecurity best practices?
How can I stay informed about the latest cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities?
What are some common social engineering tactics used by attackers, and how can I avoid them?
How can I securely dispose of electronic devices and data?
What are the ethical considerations of using technology in a responsible manner?
How can parents educate their children about online safety?
What are the different types of cybersecurity solutions available for businesses?
How can businesses develop a comprehensive cybersecurity strategy?
What are the roles and responsibilities of different stakeholders in cybersecurity?
What are the emerging trends and challenges in the cybersecurity landscape?
How can artificial intelligence be used to enhance cybersecurity?
What is the role of government in promoting cybersecurity awareness and education?
What are the international efforts to combat cybercrime?
How can businesses protect their sensitive data in the cloud?
What are the best practices for securing mobile devices?
How can businesses ensure the security of their supply chain?
What is the importance of incident response planning and preparation?
How can businesses recover from a cyberattack?
